settings.slide-tagline: We believe that you deserve the best at an affordable price
We strive to access the best resources from the top manufacturers
We design our products according to the latest trends

settings.text: Get a free copy of our ebook guide to learn our signature looks

settings.what_it_is: What it is: 35 colors that are divided into matte pigments as well as sparkly. Colors are highly pigmented, with a texture smooth and easy to mix.
settings.special_text: With this palette you can do a complete makeup: eyebrows, blush, highligther, eyeshadow and bronzer. Essential Palette light your way thanks to its intensely pigmented colors that last all day.

settings.heading: About Glow
settings.pancake1: For us, Glow Beauty Aids is a community, which is why we love to listen to and materialize the ideas of our clients and in this way bring new product lines to the market.
settings.pancake2: Glow is a new approach to beauty. It's all about functionality, fun and enhancing your own attributes.
settings.pancake3: Our products are vegan, cruelty free, paraben free, ecofriendly and handmade.

settings.heading: About Glow
settings.pancake1: As makeup creators we focus on bringing quality products to your bag, trendy and at an affordable price.
settings.pancake2: It is a line of products designed by our team of Venezuelan entrepreneurs, who wanted to bring products to the market to highlight your natural beauty.
settings.pancake3: We make products inspired by the daily life of women and how to highlight their natural beauty, without complicating their routine too much.

settings.what_it_is:
What it is: Carry it all, with a ziploc-type main compartment, it’s roomy enough for all your beauty product needs.In a transparent black white shade, stamped with our signature Glow logo.

Materials: 100% plastic.
What it is: nine colors highly pigmented, with a texture smooth and easy to mix.
settings.special_text: It is made up of six chrome shades and three matte shades in stunning mauve shades and violet. The paddle is compact and lightweight so it's easy to carry wherever go.

settings.what_it_is: What it is: A comfortable, long-wearing lip gloss with a glassy finish
settings.special_text: Fuzzy doe-foot applicator scoops up just the right amount of gloss, giving you instant shine in one swipe.

settings.what_it_is: What it is: 35 colors that are divided into matte pigments as well as sparkly. Colors are highly pigmented, with a texture smooth and easy to mix.
settings.special_text: With this palette you can do a complete makeup: eyebrows, blush, highligther, eyeshadow and bronzer. Essential Palette light your way thanks to its intensely pigmented colors that last all day.

settings.what_it_is: What it is: Big eye shadow brush. The round shape of this brush allow you to pack shadows and pigments on the lid with concentrated control.
settings.special_text:
This tapered crease brush has just the right amount of fullness and firmness for a perfect blend and smooth transitions between colors. This brush is a great choice for makeup lovers of all skill levels. 

Our makeup brush is 100% cruelty free. 

Bristles: 3/4"

Full Length: 7"

Bristle Type: Natural

settings.what_it_is: What it is: nine colors highly pigmented, with a texture smooth and easy to mix.
settings.special_text: It is made up of  five chrome shades and four matte shades in live aquamarine and others cool tones.The palette is compact and light, in addition to have a mirror.
